  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120311</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120311</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Analiziraj nihalo  v ravnovesju pod nekim kotom</string>
            <string language="en">Analyze a pendulum held at some angle in equilibrium</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Analysieren Sie ein Pendel, das in irgendeinem 
Winkel im Gleichgewicht angehalten wird</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Analysez un pendule tenu à un certain angle dans
l'équilibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Analise um pêndulo prendido em algum ângulo no 
equilíbrio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Analizzi un pendolo tenuto ad un certo angolo 
nell'equilibrio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναλύστε ένα εκκρεμές που κρατιέται σε κάποια γωνία 
στην ισορροπία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Analice un péndulo sostenido a un cierto ángulo
en equilibrio</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Dolgo nihalo je vzdrževano v ravnovesju z vodoravnim pritiskanjem na utež.</string>
            <string language="en">The long pendulum is held in equilibrium with the use of horizontal force applied to a mass.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ravnovesje</string>
            <string language="en">equilibrium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">statika</string>
            <string language="en">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das lange Pendel wird im Gleichgewicht mit dem 
Gebrauch von horizontaler Kraft angewendet an einer Masse angehalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le long pendule est tenu dans l'équilibre avec 
l'utilisation de la force horizontale appliquée à une masse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O pêndulo longo é prendido no equilíbrio com o
uso da força horizontal aplicado a uma massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il pendolo lungo è tenuto nell'equilibrio con 
l'uso di forza orizzontale applicato ad una massa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μακρύ εκκρεμές κρατιέται στην ισορροπία με τη 
χρήση της οριζόντιας δύναμης που εφαρμόζεται σε μια μάζα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El péndulo largo se sostiene en equilibrio con 
el uso de la fuerza horizontal aplicado a una masa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gleichgewicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">statics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">equilíbrio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">statics</string>
          </keyword>
